title: Can we talk about how LeBlanc can one shot full build casters without landing half her shit?
body:
Through Abyssal. She can literally miss one distortion + chains and just kill you with the other distortion and sigil.

How is this healthy?

replies.body:
LB can never oneshot you with RW -> Q unless she is 12/1, level 16+ and you're 0/15, have zero magic res, and she has mejai's at full stacks.


I agree she's strong and overtuned, but don't exaggerate your claims.

> [{quoted}](name=LeBlanc or Troll,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Rn5zE754,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-18T08:07:23.509+0000)
>
> LB can never oneshot you with RW -> Q unless she is 12/1, level 16+ and you're 0/15, have zero magic res, and she has mejai's at full stacks.
> 
> 
> I agree she's strong and overtuned, but don't exaggerate your claims.

Except I just had a late game where both teams were 18 + full build, and LeBlanc killed me through my Lux from 100% through Abyssal + W with WRQ + Ignite after I flashed her first Distortion and sidestepped chains.

> [{quoted}](name=Yenn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Rn5zE754,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-18T08:12:25.965+0000)
>
> Except I just had a late game where both teams were 18 + full build, and LeBlanc killed me through my Lux from 100% through Abyssal + W with WRQ + Ignite after I flashed her first Distortion and sidestepped chains.

and then any burst champion would have killed you just as fast (if not faster) with the same amount of skills used. That's what burst does, you have no HP and barely any MR. A single defensive item is not going to protect you from burst damage. Specially not from someone who was FULL BUILD!

Are you talking about the game as lux just before your most recent game where your only item with a defensive stat was an abyssal scepter?

Cause yeah, Leblanc should be killing you with two skills at that point. Build a banshee veil, rod of ages, rylais, liandries torment, anything. You cant buy an offensive item with a defensive stat and think yourself immune to burst damage.

if you don't have defense on and you don't kill leblanc faster than she kills you then leblanc will kill you

Nothing more needs to be discussed here...

Except ahri, when leblanc goes deep ahri just goes faster. Cuz ahri likes it like that.
